title: Calories in Wendy's Large Fries
meta_description: Learn calories in Wendy's large fries: about 470 kcal per serving, with full breakdown of carbs, fat, sodium, and tips for tweaks.
assumptions: Wendy's Natural-Cut Fries, large size (approx. 170g), fried, standard seasoning; based on official Wendy's nutrition data.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, batch, and customizations; fast food values can changeâ€”check Wendy's app or site for latest.

quick_answer.text: A large serving of Wendy's fries contains 470 kcal, mostly from carbs and fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Chili cheese fries upgrade (add chili and cheese)

faqs.q: How many calories in Wendy's large fries?
What are the carbs in Wendy's large fries?
faqs.a: About 62 g total carbs, including 6 g fiber.

faqs.q: How much fat is in a large order of Wendy's fries?
faqs.a: 22 g total fat, with 3.5 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: Are Wendy's large fries high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 340 mg sodium per serving.

faqs.q: How do Wendy's fries compare to medium size?
faqs.a: Medium has about 340 kcal; large adds ~130 kcal more.
